modals.app-contribution.ads12hRemoval: Get rid of full screen ads for the next 12h by watching 2 rewards ads
modals.app-contribution.ads6hRemoval: Get rid of full screen ads for the next 6h by watching 1 reward ads
modals.app-contribution.androidTextSubsc: Subscriptions will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. You can cancel anytime with your Google Play account settings.
modals.app-contribution.explainContent:
Unlock these features by becoming a Premium user:
  • No more Ads
  • Playlist feature
  • Unlimited Kodi Hosts
  • Backup settings

All devices logged to the same user will be affected
modals.app-contribution.explainTierText2: There are different Tier products, they all have the same effect, only the price changes, it lets you choose what you think wako worth
modals.app-contribution.iosTextSubscript: Subscriptions will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. You can cancel anytime with your iTunes account settings. Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription. For more information, see our Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy.
A {{ productPrice }}/month purchase will be applied to your iTunes account on confirmation.
A {{ productPrice }}/year purchase will be applied to your iTunes account on confirmation.
modals.app-contribution.premium-user: Congratulations, you are a Premium user.
modals.app-contribution.title: Wako Premium
modals.app-contribution.trial-active: Your trial period is active! {{days}} days remaining to enjoy all premium features.
modals.app-contribution.trialExpired: Your trial period has expired. To continue using the app, please choose a product below
modals.app-outdated.text: Your app is outdated, you have to update it to continue

modals.list-picker.title: Pick a list
modals.signIn.explain: You can browse information without connecting wako to your Trakt/SIMKL account, however you will need to connect wako to your Trakt/SIMKL account to sync and update your watch history, watch list, etc. Using your Trakt/SIMKL account means that all your history is available on all your devices with Trakt/SIMKL access, including available on Trakt.tv/SIMKL.com on the web.

pages.addons.list-unknown-sources.alert: Third party add-ons will be given access to your data stored on wako. By allowing, you agree that you solely responsible for any loss of data and unwanted behaviour to your app. Please be aware that third party add-ons are neither developed nor endorsed by wako and that wako cannot be held responsible about what these add-ons do.

pages.filer-settings.video-type.explainT: Some service create transcoded files of your videos in a format that is compatible with almost every player including Chromecast that supports only few video format. It's better to enable it for Chromecast. Be aware that transcoded files may won't include other subtitles/audio tracks that original files could include
pages.filer-settings.video-type.preferTr: Prefer transcoded files for Chromecast only
pages.filer.noCompatibleAddon: You have no compatible Add-on installed yet
pages.filer.title: File Explorer
pages.home.upToDate: Nothing to watch, you're up to date :)
pages.kodi-detection.cardContent:
Kodi hosts are now being searched on your network.
Select one from the list to add it or press the "SKIP" button to add it manually.
pages.kodi-detection.detectHostHelper:
Not host found yet (could take some seconds). Don't forget to start Kodi
The Automatic detection works by using Zeroconf. If it's not detecting your Kodi, then try enabling Zeroconf in Kodi by going to Settings > Services > General and enable "Announce services to other systems"
pages.kodi-detection.title: Kodi detection
pages.kodi-detection.troubleShooting: If you have any issue connecting wako to kodi, please read the documentation here

shared.install-addons.waning: Note that unofficial add-ons (wako or stremio) are not provided by wako and you should contact their authors for support.

toasts.kodi-remote-control.warningWebsoc:
Warning - you are not connected to kodi through websocket service. You need to activate in Kodi this option:
Allow remote control from applications on others systems

Go to https://wako.app/kodi-remote-control for more information
